gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for imagery and gridded data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: COAWST Hindcast:Barnegat Bay:ADCIRC tides,Real rivers,Plume,Lowpass Espresso bdry,NAM,new bathy

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Barnegat Bay run driven by ADCIRC tides on the boundaries, realistic river forcing with low-passed elevation from Espresso on the boundaries. Atmospheric forcing is from the NAM model, using the new bathymetry.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: This URL provides a standard OPeNDAP html interface for selecting data from this dataset. Change the extension to .info for a description of the dataset.
This URL provides an NCDC climate and weather toolkit view of an OPeNDAP resource.
